page.title: 17SHOPPING AREAS
page.content: This part of Workington does not have many shops as it is largely a residential area and industrial region.The shops that do exist are mainly found along the{main road}that runs through the area.Here can be found shops selling{convenience goods such as bakers,grocers newsagents and fish and chip shops.For more expensive items such as{consumer durables}the people of this area have to travel to the town centre of Workington which is about 1 mile away. The village of{Harrington}has it's own shops including a post office,newsagents and small supermarket.Again most of the shops are found along the main road through the village,this is so that the shopkeepers can catch{passing trade}as well as the local trade.
